title: Last Will of Anna de Trinidade Brazil MCQ 2

content.prompt: The passage best supports which of the following statements?

choices.label: A small number of women were able to acquire wealth and property on their own.
Slaves were permitted to maintain families of their own.
Women contributed to the family income by weaving textiles.
Women were the legal heads of the household in most families.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
